Title: Lesson 1 Days of the Week
Content: 本单元我们学习星期的表达,和14个学习用品:paper纸, tape胶带, glue (stick)胶棒,scissors剪刀,book书,pen钢笔, pencil铅笔, marker记号笔, crayon蜡笔,eraser橡皮, ruler格尺,(pencil-)sharpener削笔刀, pencil-box文具盒, backpack书包.本节课我们学习 165-166课时Unit 11 Lesson 1 Days of the Week主要学习内容如下:课堂上,我们通过一个星期七天人们的面部表情,引导学生学习Days of Week 星期的表达方式:Monday星期一, Tuesday星期二, Wednesday星期三, Thursday星期四, Friday星期五, Saturday星期六, Sunday星期日;关键句:What day is it today? It’s Monday/Tuesday/Wednesday/Thursday/Friday/Saturday/Sunday (today).

Title: Lesson 2 School Supplies(1)
Content: 本节课我们学习167-168课时Unit 11 Lesson 2 School Supplies (1) 主要学习内容如下:学习5个school supplies学习用品:paper纸, tape胶带, glue (stick)胶棒,scissors剪刀,book书。关键句:What’s this?  It’s paper. It’s a tape/glue/book. What are these? They are scissors.

Title: Lesson 3 School Supplies(2)
Content: 本节课我们学习 169-170课时 Unit 11 Lesson 3 School Supplies (2) 主要学习内容如下:学习4个school supplies学习用品:pen钢笔, pencil铅笔, marker记号笔, crayon蜡笔。关键句:What’s this? It’s a pen/pencil/marker/crayon.

Title: Lesson 4 School Supplies(3)
Content: 本节课我们学习171-172课时 Unit 11 Lesson 4 School Supplies (3) 主要学习内容如下:学习5个school supplies学习用品:eraser橡皮, ruler格尺,(pencil-)sharpener削笔刀, pencil-box文具盒, backpack书包.  关键句:What’s this?  It’s an eraser. It’s a ruler/sharpener/pencil-box/backpack.

Title: Lesson 5 Unit Review
Content: 本节课我们学习 173-174课时 Unit 11 Lesson 5 Unit Review主要学习内容如下:【1】复习本单元学的星期的表达:What day is it today? It’s Monday/Tuesday/Wednesday/Thursday/Friday/Saturday/Sunday (today). 【2】复习本单元所学的14个学习用品:paper纸, tape胶带, glue (stick)胶棒,scissors剪刀,book书,pen钢笔, pencil铅笔, marker记号笔, crayon蜡笔,eraser橡皮, ruler格尺,(pencil-)sharpener削笔刀, pencil-box文具盒, backpack书包.
